sentences.en: I destroy all noisome and rank weeds , I keep down all pestilent vapours.
sentences.cn: 我摧毁了一切丛生的毒草,控制一切有害的烟雾.

sentences.en: Noisome vapours arise from the mud left in the docks.
sentences.cn: 难闻的蒸汽由船坞中余留的泥浆散发出来。

sentences.en: Surely he shall deliver thee from the snare of the fowler, and from the noisome pestilence.
sentences.cn: 3他必救你脱离捕鸟人的网罗, 和毒害的瘟疫.

sentences.en: Surely he shall deliver thee from the snare of the fowler, and the noisome pestilence.
sentences.cn: 他必救你脱离捕鸟人的网罗和毒害的瘟疫.

sentences.en: Surely he shall deliver thee the snare of the fowler, and the noisome pestilence.
sentences.cn: 3他必救你脱离捕鸟人的网罗和毒害的瘟疫.

sentences.en: The air is infected with noisome gases.
sentences.cn: 空气受到了有害气体的污染.

trans.tran_cn: <文>有害的，有毒的，恶臭的，讨厌的
